org.apache.ambari.server.stack

Class StackDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.StackDefinitionDirectory
      • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.StackDirectory

  • public class StackDirectory
extends StackDefinitionDirectory
    Encapsulates IO operations on a stack definition stack directory.

      • getLibraryClassLoader

        @Nullable
public URLClassLoader getLibraryClassLoader()
        Gets the ClassLoader that can be used to load classes found in JARs in the stack's library folder.
        Returns:
        the class loader for 3rd party JARs supplied by the stack or null if there are no libraries for this stack.
